name: Corpse disaster-survivors
description:
In a war between humans and viruses
There seems to be a mysterious man in control
As if everything was in his plan
We search for supplies in the city, but fall into it
Where did we receive a message from him
But he didn't know that the technology of a piece of information at that time could be located.
When looking for a mysterious person, each conversation changes a different ending
Many zombie obstructions will be encountered on the road
Don't be afraid the gun in your hand is enough
Most of the bullets in guns can't destroy all zombies
To run successfully with bullets to succeed
In the game you need to stand by waves of zombies
Each type of zombie has different attack power and health
They also appear in different maps
You need to hold the weapon in your hand to fight the danger of this corpse wave
In-game plot mode and survivor mode gameplay

Take the gun in your hand and fight!

The author is the first junior high school student
Use of the author for a long time
Large material model
I feel like a toy
Impressive support
The game will be available on March 26, 2020
。
                                                   Cheers ~
